trans-unit.source: Provides the services for management of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> objects.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> provides methods that you can use to manage the workflow queues associated with a workflow instance.
Creates a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> by using the specified name and transactional scope.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is created with the specified `queueName`.
If transactional is `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is only visible inside the current transaction.
The name of the queue.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> is visible outside the scope of the current transaction.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> object.
queueName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A with the name specified by queueName already exists.
Deletes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> to delete.
queueName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Tests for the existence of the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> exists; otherwise, `false`.
queueName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Retrieves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> to retrieve.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> object.
queueName is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> was not found.
Contains the unconsumed items in the workflow queues associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService"></xref>.

When a workflow instance completes or terminates all of the unconsumed items in its workflow queues that are associated with this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> are moved to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
